project_description: A simple Flutter application with login and home screens, using the Cubit pattern for state management.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and shared utilities. The Cubit pattern is used for state management.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. Sets up the initial routes and provides the necessary Cubits using BlocProvider.

files.name: lib/cubits/auth_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AuthCubit which manages authentication state.

files.name: lib/cubits/auth_state.dart
files.description: Defines the states managed by AuthCubit.

files.name: lib/models/user_model.dart

widgets.name: LoginScreen
widgets.description: The screen where users can log in.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The screen displayed after a successful login.

widgets.name: LoginForm
widgets.description: The form users fill out to log in.

widgets.name: LogoutButton
widgets.description: A button that logs the user out when pressed.

cubits.name: AuthCubit
cubits.description: Manages the authentication state of the application.

models.name: User
models.description: Represents a user in the application.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the UI.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> LoginScreen: Open App
LoginScreen -> AuthCubit: submit login
AuthCubit -> AuthState: update state to Authenticated
AuthCubit -> HomeScreen: navigate to
HomeScreen -> AuthCubit: press logout
AuthCubit -> AuthState: update state to Unauthenticated
AuthCubit -> LoginScreen: navigate to
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using Cubits. The AuthCubit handles authentication logic and updates the AuthState accordingly. The UI reacts to state changes by displaying the appropriate screen.
navigation_flow: The app starts with the LoginScreen. Upon successful login, the user is navigated to the HomeScreen. From the HomeScreen, the user can log out and be navigated back to the LoginScreen.

pubspec_yaml.name: simple_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter application with login and home screens.
